metadata.job_to_be_done: Create and manage fillable forms for onboarding and compliance.

extracted_sections.section_title: Change flat forms to fillable (Acrobat Pro)
Create PDFs from Word mail merges
Create a PDF and send it for review
Create PDFs by printing to file
Create a PDF using the Print command (Windows)

subsection_analysis.refined_text: acrobat and Acrobat Reader users can use the Fill Sign tool to fill in flat forms . interactive form To create an interactive form, use the Prepare Form tool or enabling the fill Sign tools . if you create a different form, redo this task to enable the tools to be used . the tools are enabled for the current form only .

fill and sign PDF forms using the sign tools described in the following topics . to fill text fields, open the form in Acrobat and then select E-Sign from the global bar . Alternatively, you can select All tools Fill Sign . it displays a text field along with a toolbar . the default color for signatures is black, and the next annotations you add will be of the same size .

Manage your bulk sends Bulk sends can be managed from your Documents tab . Select Bulk Sends in the list of Your documents on the left side of the window . single-click the bulk send you to want to access, opening the context menu on the right side . click the See More link at the bottom right of the section to see all of the actions you can take .

Create PDFs from Word mail merges Mail merges generate documents like form letters . you can even set up PDFMaker to attach those PDFs to email messages generated during the PDF-creation process . if you select Automatically Send Adobe PDF Files By Email, do one of the following To create and save merged PDFs for printing or sending later in email .

create a PDF and send it for review 1. Open the file in the application used to create it . click the Convert To Adobe PDF And Send For Review button on the Acrobat PDFMaker toolbar . if available, choose Adobe PDF Convert to Adobe PDF and Send for review . follow the directions in the wizard that appears, as described in Start an email-based review.

your source document is converted to PostScript and fed directly to Distiller for conversion to PDF . the Adobe PDF printer does not include some of the features available from PDFMaker . tagged structure is required for reflowing content to a handheld device and is preferable for producing reliable results with a screen reader .

Adobe PDF is saved in the folder specified by the setting of the Adobe PDF Output Folder in the Preferences dialog box the default location is My Documents . if you specify Prompt For Adobe PDF Filename, then a Save As dialog opens when you print . click the Properties button to customize the printer setting .
